content: /*<![CDATA[*/ $('#title').html($('meta[name=map-description]').attr('content')); /*]]>*/ Zero Trust Secure Access On-premises Gateway Version 1.0.60 February 24, 2025—Zero Trust Secure Access On-premises Gateway Version 1.0.60 includes enhancements for FTP over HTTP protocol support and bug fixes. This update includes the following changes: Added FTP over HTTP protocol support for tools like PowerShell and Curl. Added OCSP stapling support for server certificate verification. Fixed a crash that occurred during large file downloads. © 2025 Trend Micro Incorporated. All rights reserved.Search Knowledge Base
